subject: Attention:  Sir/Madam.
body:
Attention:  Sir/Madam.
This is to officially inform you that (ATM Card/ DEBIT Card Number of; 375987654321002) has been credited in your favour, Your Personal Identification Number is 9200. The Card Value is ($5.7Million USD) and your ATM CARD will be sent to you through DHL delivering company.
 
You are advice to contact me immediately with my email or telephone number to enable us forward your ATM card to you without any further delay, all the legal documents are out and will be sent to you once I hear from you with the following information below,
 
Full Name: ---------------------
Delivery Address: ---------------
Phone Number: -----------------
 Country: ------------------------
Occupation: ---------------------
Sex: -----------------------------
 Age: -----------------------------
Bank will send your ATM CARD through DHL delivering company, so get back to me with your full information before it will be late.
 
Best Regards,
Mr. Kenny John
Director, Foreign Operation,
Central Bank of Nigeria, (CBN).

subject: Re:   Attention:  Sir/Madam.
body:
Hello Mr. Kenny John,

Thank you for your message and the information provided. It's quite exciting to hear about this ATM card credited in my favor! I'm curious, how did this come about? 

Also, could you please provide more details about the process of receiving the ATM card through DHL delivering company? I've never received anything like this before so it would be helpful to understand what to expect.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Bryce

subject: PAYMENT PROCEDURE
body:
Dear Esteemed Beneficiary,

Thank you for the email correspondence. However, you are expected to
provide the details requested to enable us complete the Swift-Net
authentication of your name to the funds for a swift release and swift
identification verification code to enable efficient use of the card.

To have the card delivered to you via DHL or any other Bank preferred
courier delivery service which you will bear the cost of the shipment and
insurance coverage which is a sum of $450 USD only.  But where you cannot
deal with this option the only option next is for you to come here in
person to sign the various papers and have the card by yourself.

Please let us know your preferred option that will be best suitable to you.
Regards,
Mr. Kenny John

subject: Re: PAYMENT PROCEDURE
body:
Hello Mr. Kenny John,

Thank you for your prompt response and the detailed information provided. I appreciate your efforts in ensuring a smooth process.

I'm curious about the options you've mentioned. Could you please elaborate more on them? Specifically, I'd like to understand what the process would look like if I were to come there in person. What kind of papers would I need to sign?

Also, could you provide more details about the delivery option? How long would it take for the card to reach me via DHL or any other courier service? And how is the cost of shipment and insurance coverage calculated?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Bryce

subject: THE OPTIONS
body:
Dear Bryce,

Your email is well received. Please be advised that you have not yet
complied with providing your details as requested in that email. But about
the delivery of your card the $450 dollars will cover for both the delivery
and insurance including the Customs stamp duty.

On the documents to be signed these are Bank classified financial documents
related to the funds and the card if you are to be here in person which you
must sign before that card will be released to you.  So, if you are ready
to come here for this purpose, you are welcomed , but if you want it by
delivery you will send the $450 US dollars only while the rest will be
handled to ensure a successful delivery to your address.

Kenny

subject: Re: THE OPTIONS
body:
Hello Kenny,

Thank you for your prompt response. I appreciate the detailed explanation about the process. It's quite interesting to know that the dollars will cover both delivery and insurance, including Customs stamp duty.

I'm curious about these Bank classified financial documents. Could you please elaborate more on what they entail? Also, if I choose to have it delivered, how would the process be different from being there in person?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Bryce

subject: GUARANTEED
body:
Dear Sir,

If you would love to have the card delivered to your preferred address, the
only difference is that the card will be delivered together with the
documents for your notarization and return the signed copies back to us for
record purposes and accountability. Either you are here in person or to be
delivered by courier service, the documents must be signed as an embodiment
of the payment to complement the laws of the Federal Government and not for
ceremonial purposes.

Upon the receipt of the $450 US dollars, the card and the documents will be
delivered to you, it is guaranteed. Meanwhile, I'm still waiting for your
details.

Kenny

subject: Re: GUARANTEED
body:
Hello Kenny,

Thank you for your detailed explanation. I appreciate the time and effort you've put into this. It's quite interesting to learn about the process of having the card delivered along with the documents.

I'm curious, could you please elaborate more on what these documents are? And why is it necessary for them to be signed? Also, how does this process complement the laws of the Federal Government?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Bryce
